attributes.action: regulate the volume of commercials on television.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The volume limit of commercials on television needs to be lowered to correspond to the legal volume levels of the tv shows. This will stop the sudden blaring of sound coming from your tv everytime an ad starts.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
